We are Qualified

Professionals

Preventative patrol services are proactive security measures to deter theft, vandalism, and other crime.

Cost Effective

Highly Trained

Licensed Patrol

24/7 Patrol Vehicles

1

Door Checks

Our officers will do a number of door checks and deter any suspicious or unwanted activity. Always on-site and ready to protect you.

2

Perimeter Checks

Our proactive perimeter checks have proven effective in fast emergency response and loss prevention.

3

Facility Opening and Closing

Trust us to keep the doors locked and unlocked as needed, to secure your property, equipment and inventory, and personnel.

4

Lightning assesments

A light assessment helps us to identify potential hazards and provides correcting measures needed to protect the employees or clients.

5

Parking lot assesment

A property parking lot assessment can help you avoid such an expensive risk. Our qualified patrol officers will come out to your property and assess your parking lots immediately.

6

Safety hazard identification

Being aware of on-site risks is vital. Before doing any work, we take a few minutes to check your surroundings.
